mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoChgcallPhonDetl Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ COM_NM , PHON_TURN , CNVRS_NATION_NO , CNVRS_AREA_NO , CNVRS_TLOF_NO , CNVRS_TLOF_WTHN_NO , CHRGER_NM , SORT_SEQ , USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CHGCALL_PHON_DETL WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_NM = #{comNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PHON_TURN = #{phonTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
